name: atb
description:
This project makes for a test. Enjoy.

You can edit level in: >>> here <<<

  After edit level: pls click File/Download/Tab Separated Values (.tsv). After that using "Selected file" button to select this file.

DONE

  • gird base, iso grid change by TAB button.
  • zoom, drag camera. Drag by Right mouse.
  • load spine anim with Mixer.
  • combat power bar of two teams.
  • show info of character (magic number, hp, predict dmg).
  • show atk-able, move-able info.
  • load level from file.
  • ending (win, lose, draw, dont have any moveable).
